title: ONE Championship 101 highlights: John Lineker's debut, new champion crowned
text:
ONE Championship 101 is in the books, and you can check out the highlights right here on MMA Junkie.

ONE Championship 101 took place Friday at Istora Senayan in Jakarta, Indonesia, and streamed on B/R Live. The event featured a mix of MMA and kickboxing.

In the main event, Kiamrian Abbasov scored the upset over Zebaztian Kadestam to claim the welterweight title. The card also featured the debut of former UFC fighter John Lineker, who won a unanimous decision over Muin Gafurov.

You can watch the highlights in the video above.
description: Check out the highlights from ONE Championship 101 in Indonesia.
